Text:
🥇 Achievement Unlocked: 1st Place – Inter-Department Coding Competition! 🎮💻

They said "think outside the box." 
I said "what box?" and built a new one — with better syntax and zero bugs (okay, maybe one... or ten).

My strategy: 
→ Write code 
→ Break it 
→ Fix it 
→ Repeat until something works 😅

And somehow… it worked. 
Still not sure if it was skill, or the compiler finally gave up.
Because sometimes, it’s not about being perfect — it’s about not giving up.

#CodingChampion #TechVictory #InterDepartmentChamp #CodeAndConquer

Author Headline: Pre-Final Year| AI & DS Student | AI Enthusiast |Aspiring Data Analyst| Machine Learning

Text:
🚀 Excited to share my latest project: ChronoPulse! 🌟  

ChronoPulse is an AI-driven news delivery platform designed to simplify how we consume updates from YouTube. It combines cutting-edge technology with automation to deliver bite-sized, easy-to-read news summaries directly to Telegram.  

💡 How ChronoPulse Works:  
1️⃣ Zapier Integration: Tracks specific YouTube news channels and instantly detects new video uploads.  
2️⃣ Smart Transcript Processing: Utilizes the YouTube API to fetch the video transcript, making even lengthy content easily digestible.  
3️⃣ AI-Powered Summarization: Simplifies and condenses the transcript using Google Gemini AI, ensuring that the news is presented in simple English without losing the essence.  
4️⃣ Telegram Bot Automation: Automatically sends the summarized news, along with relevant visuals like video thumbnails, to a designated Telegram group for instant consumption.  
5️⃣ Cloud Hosting: The system is deployed on Google Compute Engine, ensuring 24/7 reliability while taking full advantage of Google Cloud’s free tier.  

 💼 Key Features:  
✅ Completely automated news extraction and delivery process.  
✅ Accurate and concise summaries powered by advanced AI models.  
✅ Real-time updates, ensuring no news is missed.  
✅ Lightweight and scalable—ideal for managing high-frequency updates.  

 🌍 What Makes ChronoPulse Special?  
This project combines the best of AI, cloud computing, and automation to address the challenge of sifting through long-form YouTube content for actionable updates. By delivering timely and relevant news summaries, ChronoPulse is a step towards making news consumption more accessible, efficient, and user-friendly.  

🎯 The journey so far:  
Developing ChronoPulse was an incredible learning experience that involved integrating multiple technologies like Zapier, Telethon, the YouTube API, and Google Gemini AI. Deploying it on Google Cloud Platform’s free tier added another dimension, as I optimized it for cost-effectiveness while ensuring high reliability.  

A big thank you for your support throughout this journey—it means so much!🌟  

I’m excited about ChronoPulse’s potential to revolutionize the way we consume YouTube-based news! Would love to hear your feedback, ideas, or even ways to expand its scope. Let’s discuss! 🙌 

🔗 Explore the project on GitHub: https://lnkd.in/g3AFuB-i  
💬 Join the Telegram group for live updates: https://lnkd.in/gqeCSa7t

 
#ChronoPulse #AI #TelegramBot #YouTubeAPI #GoogleAI #Automation #CloudComputing #Python

Text:
Excited to share that I secured 1st place in DevQuest at the INNOVATIA 3.0 symposium, organized by the M-Tech CSE department of Sri Sairam Engineering College! 🏆

DevQuest is a thrilling coding event with three rounds designed to challenge and inspire:

Round 1: BitBattle - A fast-paced online coding challenge focused on problem-solving using languages like Python, Java, HTML, and CSS. The best performers advanced to the next round.

Round 2: Efficiency Shutdown - A round that required participants to optimize complex code, reducing time and space complexity. Only those with exceptional critical thinking and coding skills moved forward.

Round 3: Mystery Round - A surprise round that tested adaptability and problem-solving abilities with unexpected tasks and challenges.

A huge thank you to everyone who supported and encouraged me throughout this challenge. 🌟 Your motivation and belief in my abilities made this achievement possible!🌠

It was an incredible experience that pushed me to think creatively and enhance my coding skills. Grateful for the opportunity and looking forward to more challenges ahead! 🚀

#CodingChallenge #ProblemSolving #DevQuest #INNOVATIA3 #TechCompetition #Programming #Innovation #CriticalThinking #SoftwareDevelopment #Engineering

Text:
🚀 Excited to Share My Latest Project! 🚀

I'm thrilled to introduce a project I've been working on, combining Streamlit, LangChain, and Google Generative AI to create an interactive Q&A app! 🎉

🔍 Project Overview:

This app allows users to interactively ask questions based on data loaded from a file. By leveraging LangChain's prompt templates and Google's Gemini model, the app provides accurate and relevant responses, making it a powerful tool for data exploration.

💡 Key Highlights:
 Interactive Chat Interface: The app maintains a sessionbased chat history, offering a smooth and engaging user experience.
 Custom Data Loading: Users can easily load their own data files, making the app adaptable to various use cases.
 Seamless Integration: Built with Streamlit, the app combines a clean UI with powerful backend processing.

🔧 Technology Stack:
 Streamlit: Used to build the interactive user interface.
 LangChain: Handles the prompt templates and chaining processes.
 Google Generative AI: Utilizes the Gemini 1.5 model for generating responses.

🌟 Why It Matters:
This project showcases how modern AI and machine learning tools can be integrated to create solutions that not only process data but also provide meaningful, realtime interactions. It's a practical example of AIdriven innovation in action!

Feel free to explore the app and check out the code!

👉 [GitHub Repository](https://lnkd.in/gM-w6f_2)  
👉 [Live App](https://lnkd.in/gBKr-2-s)

I’d love to hear your feedback!

#Innovation #AI #Streamlit #LangChain #GoogleGenerativeAI #Python #MachineLearning #DataExploration #ProjectUpdate

Text:
🌟 Excited to Share My Latest Project: Mission Tomato! 🌟

I'm thrilled to announce the completion of my latest project, Mission Tomato, focused on detecting diseases in tomatoes using cutting-edge deep learning techniques. 🚀🍅

 Project Overview
🔍 Objective: To accurately identify and diagnose diseases in tomato plants through image analysis using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN).

🧠 Model: The project leverages a CNN architecture to classify tomato leaf images into various disease categories, ensuring precise and timely detection.

🔧 Deployment: The model is served using TensorFlow Serving within Docker containers, ensuring scalability and efficient model management.

☁️ Cloud Deployment: The entire application is deployed on AWS using a free-tier account, making the solution both accessible and cost-effective.

 Key Features
- High Accuracy: The CNN model is trained on a comprehensive dataset, achieving high accuracy in disease detection.
- Full-Stack Integration: The project includes a streamlined frontend and backend, providing a seamless user experience.
- Real-Time Predictions: Users can upload images of tomato leaves and receive instant predictions on the disease type along with the confidence level.
- Accessible Anywhere: Deployed on AWS, the application can be accessed from anywhere, ensuring availability and reliability.

 Check It Out!
🔗 [Live Demo](http://13.236.4.38:8000/)
🔗 [Git-Hub](https://lnkd.in/g6uQEjbB)

 Technologies Used
- Frontend: React
- Backend: FastAPI
- Model Serving: TensorFlow Serving in Docker
- Cloud: AWS (EC2, S3)
- Others: Python, NumPy, PIL, Axios, CORS

 Why This Matters
Agriculture is the backbone of our economy, and ensuring the health of crops is paramount. This project aims to empower farmers with a tool that helps them identify diseases early, reduce crop loss, and improve yields.

 Acknowledgements
Special thanks to everyone who supported me throughout this journey. Your guidance and encouragement were invaluable.

#MachineLearning #DeepLearning #AI #AgricultureTech #CNN #TensorFlow #AWS #Docker #FastAPI #Python #ProjectShowcase #MissionTomato #DiseaseDetection

Text:
🌟 Excited to share my participation in the HackPrix Hackathon at Lords Institute of Engineering & Technology in Hyderabad! 🌟

During this incredible event, I had the opportunity to develop a cutting-edge Criminal Detection and Reporting System. Leveraging advanced facial recognition technology, the system detects suspects in real-time, generates detailed PDF reports, and sends instant alerts to authorities. This project aims to enhance public safety and support law enforcement efforts through efficient and accurate suspect management.

Key Features of the System:
🔍 Real-Time Face Recognition: Continuously processes video frames for immediate suspect detection.
📄 Detailed PDF Reports: Automatically generates comprehensive reports with suspect information and images.
📧 Email Notifications: Sends real-time email alerts with attached reports to authorities for prompt action.
🌍 Location Tracking: Integrates geolocation data for added context in suspect sightings.

Challenges Overcome:
⚙️ Performance Optimization: Ensuring real-time processing and high accuracy.
🔗 Component Integration: Seamlessly combining facial recognition, reporting, notification, and tracking modules.
💾 Data Management: Efficiently handling large datasets of facial encodings and suspect details.
🔒 Security: Implementing robust measures to protect sensitive data.

Participating in this hackathon was an exhilarating experience, pushing the boundaries of what technology can achieve in enhancing public safety. A huge shoutout to Lords Institute of Engineering & Technology for hosting such an inspiring event and to all the mentors and fellow participants who made it unforgettable.

Looking forward to further refining this project and exploring its real-world applications. Onward and upward! 🚀

Check out the project on GitHub: https://lnkd.in/gkAcbk_R

#HackPrix #Hackathon #FacialRecognition #PublicSafety #Innovation #Technology #Engineering #AI #MachineLearning #CriminalDetection #Security
